body.section:
This project provides the actual application of the multi-media-manager.
This project is divided into the following sub-projects:
mmm-app-core contains the core part of the application.
mmm-app-audio contains the autio related part of the application.
mmm-app-video contains the video related part of the application.
mmm-app-pim contains the PIM (Personal Information Management) related part of the application.
mmm-app-war represents the entire application bundled as war file.
